alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:13PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of West Baton Rouge, north central Iberville and southwestern East Baton Rouge Parishes through 745 PM CDT... At 713 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grosse Tete, or 8 miles west of Port Allen, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Port Allen, Addis, Brusly, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Erwinville, Westminster and Gardere. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 140 and 161. Interstate 110 in Louisiana near mile marker 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge
